ygData.subject: OoT( was Weapon Sketches)
ygData.msgSnippet: A great map and source of information about the Ocean of Tears can be found at: http://www.everworld.net/norrath/maps/oot1.shtml Keep in mind that the boat
ygData.messageBody:
A great map and source of information about the Ocean of Tears can be found at:

http://www.everworld.net/norrath/maps/oot1.shtml

Keep in mind that the boat trip mapped was before the inclusion of the
SirensBane, though. I have the two boats
mapped at home, though: From FP to BB, the boat stops at the Sisters and doesn't
make the southern dip to stop at
Zach's; from BB to FP, it stops at Zach and then stay south of the 5 islands to
the other side.

- Nikolita, Floating Merchant and Oceanographer
